tool_contract.description:
Generate a report for a Iso-Seq Cluster run, given both
consensus isoforms reads in Fasta file and a
cluster summary.

output_types.title: Output JSON
output_types.description: Path to write Report json output.

tool_contract.name: Iso-Seq Cluster Report

input_types.description: Reads in FASTA format, usually are consensus, isoforms produced by Iso-Seq Cluster.
input_types.title: Fasta reads

input_types.description: A summary produced by Iso-Seq Cluster, e.g. cluster_summary.txt
input_types.title: Summary text
